h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: As you head inside, **stick to the right side of the building and then go up the then go up the stairs**. This will bring you to the top of the building, where you'll want to go outside using the door on the left. When you're on the balcony, go right, and then right again to find a wooden bridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
As you head inside, **stick to the right side of the building and then go up the then go up the stairs**. This will bring you to the top of the building, where you'll want to go outside using the door on the left. When you're on the balcony, go right, and then right again to find a wooden bridge.
